MAIN_MESSAGE: The following information is for customers in the DG7 postcode area of Stewartry. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30AM due a fault with our electrical equipment and we require to connect a generator and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and safely as possible by 2:30AM. We will update messages with any additional information as quickly as we can. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:55PM on 18 March 2021.
